attributes.title: Not what I expected
attributes.review:
After downloading, I was expecting to see detailed news and stuff that made me feel better, but instead all I saw was a sign-up page.
How dare the government try to obtain my private info!
I shouldnâ€™t have to give up my privacy rights on an APP by sending my phone number, email, social security, and private account information.
JUST GIVE ME WHAT I WANT.

attributes.title: Absolutely awful!!
attributes.review:
I was so excited to support the BEST president this country has yet seen, but upon opening the app the image displayed in the background gave me HORRIBLE flashbacks to when I took a trip to Cuba but was taken to Jamaica instead. 

It brought up awful memories of being involved in a Jamaican dog fighting circle that had taken me years to overcome. 

Even weeks later after using the app, Iâ€™m still having HORRID flashbacks and fever dreams. 

Most definitely would not recommend, worst app I have EVER used in the 47 years Iâ€™ve been on this wonderful earth. 

Save yourself the time a trouble my fellow supporters, take care:

-Linda Evangelista

attributes.title: BAD BAD BAD!!!

Anyways my phone then started blowing up with stuff asking for my info!! My credit card info, my address, my phone number,etc. My phone THEN STARTS CRASHING!!! I canâ€™t belive it itâ€™s such a bad app donâ€™t buy 100% DONT recommend >:(( I am VERY disappointed

attributes.title: terrible app!!
attributes.review: First of all it took very long to download onto my phone and eats up your storage very fast. Once I logged into it my phone started glitching and the email i signed up with got hacked. This app sells your information. DO NOT TRUST IT. All i wanted to do was support our great president but I had to delete this app after not even 15 minutes of having it.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I LOVE the president i really do but the very first screen is a phone number screen. I really was hoping to have access to news without spam messages but apparently not. Not to mention theres a weird point system to get various things. It also kept kicking me out every time i opened the app. Trump 2020, but not this app.
